content:
Hi @Lloyd McKenzie The IG publisher is reporting this error...
"The jira specification file appears to be out of date with the versions, artifacts and pages currently defined in the IG. "
... even though the file in the Jira-spec-artifact GitHub project matches the suggested file generated by the publisher. The only difference is that the suggested file omits the specification @gitUrl attribute.

I don't see any debugging details about this in the IG Publisher output. Any thoughts on how to troubleshoot this? Or can I ignore the warning if the IG artifacts are showing up okay in Jira (they seem to be)?
Thx
Right now, the comparison is whitepace sensitive. If your content is identical other than whitespace, you can ignore.
Thanks Lloyd. The whitespace appears to be the culprit... the contents are the same when I do a compare ignoring spaces and line breaks.
